mapper.select: SELECT isbn_cd As isbnCd , production_name As productionName , author_name As authorName , publisher As publisher , issued_date As issuedDate , price As price , category As category , book_path As bookPath , description1 As description1 , description2 As description2 , stock As stock , language As language , resgister_dt As resgister_Dt , register_date As registerDate , update_dt As updateDt , update_date As updateDate FROM m_book
